name: lspgpot
description: lspgpot - extracts the ownertrust values from PGP keyrings and list them in GnuPG ownertrust format.
body:
lspgpot

NAME

lspgpot - extracts the ownertrust values from PGP keyrings and list them in GnuPG ownertrust format.

SYNOPSIS

lspgpot

DESCRIPTION

lspgpot extracts the ownertrust values from PGP keyrings and list them in GnuPG ownertrust format.
